p: All tested concentrations showed a number of treated/control colonies ratio less than 2, both in presence and in absence of S9 mix microsomal fraction ( Table 6). Therefore, none of the texted extracts were considered potentially mutagenic. As regards the EO, a cytotoxic effect is noted at the highest concentrations. Our results pointed out the safety of O. campechianum extracts and EO with regard to genotoxicity [ 11].
